column2: Ukraine-Russia: ‘Intumbero yanje ntiyari iyo gusambura Ukraine’- Putin
column3: Perezida Vladimir Putin w’Uburusiya avuga ko ata bindi bitero bikomeye bikenewe muri Ukraine, imisi mike inyuma y’ibibombe bikomeye bitari bike vyatewe kuri iki gihugu kuva intambara itangura. Avuga ko ibibanza hafi  vyose vyari vyateguwe guterwa vyarashwe, kandi ko intumbero yiwe itari ugusambura Ukraine. Avuga kandi ko intumbero ya Moscou yo kwinjiza abantu 300.000 mu gisirikare izoba yashitsweko mu ndwi zibiri. Avuze ibi mu gihe ingabo z’Uburusiya ahenshi ziriko zisubira inyuma, Ukraine nayo igenda itera intambwe, inyuma y’amezi amezi hafi umunani kuva iyi ntambara itanguye. Avugana n’abanyamakuru inyuma y’ikoraniro ryahuje abategetsi b’akarere ku mugwa mukuru  wa Kazakhstan, Astana, umukuru w’igihugu c’Uburusiya yavuze ko ibibanza 22 kuri 29 vyari vyateguwe guterwa muri Ukraine vyarashwe kandi ko igisirikare “kiriko kirashikira indwi bindi bisigaye”. Ati: "Nta bitero bikomeye bigikenewe. Ubu dufise ibindi bikorwa”. Kuva ku wa mbere, Uburusiya bwatanguje igihuhusi c’ibitero vya misire ku bisagara bitari bike vya Ukraine, mu co Putin avuga ko kwari ukwihora igitero cakozwe ku kiraro gikomeye gifatanya Uburusiya n’akarere ka Crimée/Crimea bwigaruriye. Abantu batari bake barasize ubuzima muri ibi bitero abandi barakomereka, inyubakwa nazo zirononekara. Uturere two hagati tw’umugwa mukuru Kyiv natwo nyene twarashikiriwe ku ncuro ya mbere kuva intambara yaduka. Ariko Putin avuga ko intumbero y’Uburusiya itari gusambura Ukraine, ariko ntiyicuza kuri iki gitero. Ati: "Muri make ibiriko biraba ntibiryoshe. Ariko aho nyene, [n’iyo Uburusiya budatera], ibintu biba bimeze uko bimeze, ariko gusa ibintu biba ari bibi cane kuri twebwe. Rero turiko dukora ibintu vyose neza kandi mu gihe nyaco”. Perezida Putin avuga ko abantu 200.000 bamaze kwinjizwa mu gisirikare, kandi ko muri bo 16.000 bamaze gushika ku rugamba. Yongerako y’uko abona ko bidakenewe ko abandanya atera akamo ngo abantu biyandikishe. Hagati aho, akamo yateye kateje uburakari burenze urugero mu Burusiya, bituma abagabo ibihumbi n’ibihumbi bahungira mu bihugu bibanyi. BBC kandi yabonye ko abaherutse kwinjizwa ata nyigisho zikwiye bahawe imbere y’uko barungikwa ku rugamba. Ni mu gihe igisata ca BBC gikoresha ururimi rw’ikirusiya kivuga ko camenye abasirikare b’Uburusiya barenga 7500 bamaze gupfira mu ntambara ya Ukraine. Igitigiri c’abamaze kuhapfira kizwi ko ari kinini cane, mbere hari n’amakuru avuga ko bamwe mu baherutse kwinjizwa  bishwe. Avuga ku migenderanire n’ivyahoze bigize Ubumwe bw’Abasoviyeti, Perezida Putin ashimangira ko ata ngorane intambara yateye kuri vyo. Avuga ko ari ibisanzwe ko ibihugu bimwe bimwe bigira impungenge ariko ko abandanya abibwira uko ibintu bimeze igihe cose. Hagati aho, abihweza ibintu n’ibindi bavuga ko ikibanza Uburusiya bufise mu karere kiriko kiragabanuka, mu gihe abakuru b’ibihugu nka Kassym-Jomart wa Kazakhstan  bariko bitandukanya na Putin kuri ino ntambara.

column2: Coronavirus: WHO isaba ibihugu vya Afrika kutajugunya incanco zataye igihe
column3: Ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO, risaba ibihugu vya Afrika kudaturira incanco za Covid-19 zishobora kuba zarataye igihe. Ibi bihugu vyasabwe kubangira bikarindira iyindi nzira nyayo. Aka kamo ka OMS kaje inyuma y'aho ibihugu vya Malawi na Sudani y'Epfo bitangarije ko bitegura guturira doze hafi 70.000 z'urucanco rwa Oxford-AstraZeneca kubera zataye igihe hagati muri uku kwa kane. Ariko ikigo ca Afrika kijejwe kurwanya indwara (Africa CDC) kivuga ko cari cijejwe ko izi ncanco ata ngorane zifise, zishobora gukoreshwa. Incanco nyinshi zirashobora gukoreshwa gushika ku mezi 36 (umwaka n'igice) kuva zihinguwe, ariko kubera ko izi za Covid-19 ari nshasha, nta vyemezo bikwiye bihari vyerekana ko zishobora kumara igihe kirekire zigifise inguvu. Ingingo ya nyuma izofatwa n'ibisata vy'ibihugu bijejwe kugenzura imiti. Igikorwa co gucandaga abantu mu kubakingira coronavirus muri Afrika kigenda bukebuke, ahanini kubera atazihari zikwiye hamwe n'abantu benshi bazifiseko amakenga. Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru ejo ku wa kane, John Nkengasong,  arongoye ikigo Africa CDC yavuze ati:  "Akamo ntera ibihugu vya Afrika ni aka: nimba uruhara rwacu ari ukurondera izi ncanco, namwe uruhara rwanyu ni uko mukoresha izi ncanco". Malawi ivuga ko itegura guturira doze zirenga 16.000 z'urucanco rwa AstraZeneca rwahinguwe na kompanyi y'Ubuhindi, Serum Institute of India (SII), kubera igihe cazo ntarengwa cari gushika ku wa 13 z'uku kwa kane. Ku ruhande rwayo, Sudani y'Epfo itegura guturira doze hafi 59.000 kuri iyo mvo nyene. Izi ncanco zari zahawe ibihugu 13 vya Afrika mu mugambi wo gufashanya hagati y'Umuryango w'ibihugu vya Afrika (UA) n'ikompanyi y'itumatumanako MTN , nk'uko bivugwa na Peter Mwai wo mu gisata Reality Check ca BBC. Umuryango w'ibihugu vya Afrika waguze umuriyoni wa doze za  AstraZeneca zari muri Afrika y'Epfo yari yahagaritse gutanga kubera amakenga ko zitari gukinga ubwoko bushasha bwa Covid-19 bwari burwiriye muri ico gihugu. Ikigo Africa CDC caciye kizirungika mu bihugu mu mpera z'ukwa gatatu, hasigaye indwi nkeya ngo zite igihe. Nkengasong yavuze ko ikompanyi Serum Institute of India (SII) yahanuye Africa CDC ko "izi ncanco zishobora kubandanya zikoreshwa mu kiringo c'amezi icenda inyuma y'itariki ntarengwa". Umukuru wa OMS mu karere ka Afrika, Matshidiso Moeti , asaba ibihugu "kubika neza izi ncanco mu gihe tukibandanya twiga twongera tugerageza kurondera kumenya nimba izi ncanco zishobora gukoreshwa mu kiringo kirekire". Uretse Malawi na Sudani y'Epfo, OMS ivuga ko Ghana na Sierra Leone navyo nyene bitakoresheje incanco zose kubera zari zataye igihe. Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu wa Sierra Leone avuga ko igihugu cari gisigaranye hafi ica gatatu ca doze cari cahawe. Austin Demby  yabwiye BBC ati:  "Twategerezwa gukora ibishoboka vyose tugakoresha izi ncanco". Ku bihugu 55 vya Afrika, 41 nivyo vyahawe incanco biciye mu mugambi mpuzamakungu Covax wo guhanahana izi ncanco. Hari ibindi indwi bikirindiriye kuronswa igice ca mbere. Umugambi wa Covax ufise intumbero yo gusaranganya incanco mu bihugu vyose ku rugero rungana, vyaba ibitunze canke ibikenye. Gushika ubu, doze zingana n'imiriyoni 38 nizo zimaze guhabwa ibihugu 98. Abahinga bavuga ko kugira ngo iki kiza karanda kirwanye ari uko incanco ziatangwa ku rugero rungana ku bihugu vyose kw'isi.

column2: Christine Ntahe: Menya uyu murundikazi yahawe agashimwe ka Kenn Allen Global Award
column3: Umupfasoni Christine Ntahe w'umurundikazi yahawe agashimwe mpuzamakungu ku bikorwa vyiwe vyo kwitangira uburenganzira bwa kiremwamuntu cane cane mu kwitaho abana bo mw'ibarabara. Ni agashimwe ahawe nk'umukorerabushake n'ishirahamwe International Association for Volunteer Effort kitiriwe Kenn Allen Global Award kaje kwiyongera ku bundi butari buke amaze kuronka kubera ibi bikorwa vyiwe amazemwo imyaka irenga 25. Christine Ntahe, Maman Dimanche nk'uko azwi cane i Bujumbura no mu gihugu, yabwiye BBC ko yatanguye gufasha abana bo mw'ibarabara mu 1994, igihe igihugu cari mu ndyane z'amoko zatanguye inyuma y'igandagurwa rya Perezida Melchior Ndadaye mu 1993. Ati: "Naciye ngerageza kuba hafi y'abana bo mw'ibarabara, mvuga nti nta mwana ategerezwa kuba mw'ibarabara, ibarabara ntirirera. Ntangura kubaba hafi igihe amasasu yari menshi mu gisagara ca Bujumbura no mu gihugu cose, jewe nkaba nahambije abana bo mw'ibarabara bo mu gisagara". Mu mwaka wa 2000, umupfasoni Ntahe yashinze ishirahamwe Bon Geste ryo gufasha abana ba ntahonikora uhereye ku bana bo mw'ibarabara, impfuvyi n'abandi ba ntahonikora mu Burundi, igihugu cagiye gica mu ndyane zatumye biyongera. Umupfasoni Ntahe avuga ko yatanguriye ku bana cumi bo mw'ibarabara, ubu akaba amaze kuramura abatari bake, mbere bamwe muri bo bahejeje amakaminuza, abandi bakaba baciga. Avuga ko bitamworoheye kubera ibibazo vy'amoko vyari bihanze igihugu ico gihe kuko wewe yakira uwo ari we wese ataravye amamuko yiwe. Ati: "Ndibuka ca gihe Uburundi bwari mu bihano, nahora ngenda kubatora n'amaguru hariya kuri Place de l'Indépendance [ikibanza citiriwe ukwikukira], tukaza n'amaguru, hari henshi twaca bakadutera amabuye, ntitwari tuzi abo ari bo". Ntahe avuga ko impande zompi zamurwanya kuko ata ruhande na rumwe rwemera ivyo akora. Ati: "Irya ntambara yari iy'ubwoko hagati y'Abahutu n'Abatutsi. Hariho Abahutu bamwe bamwe bambwira bati ntitukwemera kuko ntamututsikazi n'umwe ashobora gukorera iciza umuhutu ataco ariko ararondera. "Abatutsi nabo bamwe bamwe bakambwira bati 'umviriza, ivyo ukora vyose wiruka inyuma y'abo bana b'Abahutu, nibo bazoza kugukata umutwe'. "Jewe rero nta hantu na hamwe nari mpagaze, uretse guhagararira ukuri, urukundo n'ugukorera Imana kuko nabona ko abana bariko bazira ubusa". Ni ivyo bikorwa vyiwe vyo kwitangira abana vyamuhaye iritazirano rya "Maman Dimanche" rizwi cane i Bujumbura, avuga ko yahawe n'abo bana nyene asanzwe afasha. Avuga ko muri kino gihe afise abana bashika amajana abiri yama afungurira imisi yose muhira iwe. Kuva atanguye iki gikorwa, amaze kuramura amajana n'amajana, bamwe biga muri za kaminuza, zaba izo mu gihugu canke hanze, abandi nabo bakaba bakibandanya amashure mato n'ayisumbuye. "Ico babigiriye ntaco nzi, gusa barashimye, kandi iyo bashimye uvyakira uko. Jewe rero ni agashimwe kiyongera ku bundi, kuko n'umukuru w'igihugu yarampaye agashimwe mu 2012", niko Ntahe avuga. Ku bw'iwe, ivyo akora abikora nk'umuvyeyi arera abana biwe neza, hanyuma bakaramurwa. Ati: "Ubundi nta muntu yategerezwa gushimirwa ariko arakora ico yategerezwa gukora, kuko nico Imana ituremera kw'isi, kugira umuntu afashe aho ari mu vyo ashobora. "Mu mutima jewe nta kintu kinini nabona nkora co gushimirwa kuko mbona umengo hari vyinshi ntarakora. "Ariko gusa ibi vyerekana ko ivyo nkora bishimwa n'ababibona, mu kuvyerekana bakabicisha muri utu dushimwe n'imfashanyo nkenke baza barafashisha". Christine Ntahe avuga ko ata wundi mugambi afise uretse kubandanya afasha aba bana bo mw'ibarabara kuko babandanya biyongera. Ati: "Jewe umugambi ni uwo kubandanya ndabakurikirana, nongera ndabafasha kugira ngo bashike ku ndoto zabo. Ati: "Usanga abenshi ubabajije bavuga ko bashaka kwiga kugira ngo bazotere imbere. Bafise indoto, nanje indoto zanje ni ugushikana abo bana ku ndoto zabo". Uretse abo yafashije i Bujumbura, ubu baharurwa mu majana ane, hari abandi bo muri komine Mutambu y'intara ya Bujumbura bashika ku 600 yafashije kubera iyo komine yabaye ikiririmbiro ry'intambara. Christine Ntahe avuga ko ibibazo agira muri iki gikorwa ari vyinshi cane, cane cane bishingiye ku buryo, mu gihe "abana bo mw'ibarabara bakenera vyinshi kandi babandanya biyongera". Ati: "Abo bana baguma biyongera, ivyo kubafungurira ntibikwira, abana ugasanga barwara nkabura uburyo bwo kubavuza, ibi vyose ni ingorane zikomeye mu gihe ari jewe jenyene nibako". Christine Ntahe arashima ingene reta yitayeho ikibazo c'abana bo mw'ibarabara, ariko akavuga ko hari ingorane nyinshi. Hamaze kugeragezwa kenshi kuvana abo bana mw'ibarabara na cane cane mu gisagara ca Bujumbura, umwe wese akajanwa iyo akomoka kugira yitabweho n'abo aho avuka canke ubutegetsi bw'aho. Madame Ntahe yemeza ko hari ibintu bitagenze neza kuko "abenshi muri bo baca bagaruka". Ati: "Ntibaba bateguwe bikwiye, na cane cane abavyeyi babo, kuko abana bamaze umwanya munini mw'ibarabara, biragoye kubumvisha ko bosubira mu miryango yabo". Christine Ntahe avuga ko ingorane nyamukuru ari uko hari abavyeyi barungika abana babo mw'ibarabara. Ati: "Hari umwana akubarira ati 'jewe ntaronse ibihumbi bitatu ku musi sintaha, mama ntankundira'. Ibaze rero abavyeyi baguma muhira bakarindira ko abana babo baja mw'ibarabara kubaronderera ibibabeshaho". Mu gihe hari abagiriza reta n'amashirahamwe yitaho agateka k'abana ko ikibazo cabananiye, umupfasoni Ntahe wewe yagiriza abavyeyi ko ari bo ntambamyi nyamukuru mu twigoro two kubakura mw'ibarabara. Ati: "Ni ukuri reta n'amashirahamwe bakora uko bashoboye ariko rero abavyeyi nabo ni intambamyi". Umupfasoni Ntahe arashima ibikorwa n'abajejwe agateka k'abana ariko agasaba reta gukora uko ishoboye igahimiriza abavyeyi bagakurikirana abana babo. Ati: "Abatishoboye rwose reta ikabafasha, ibahimirize kugira baje mu mashirahamwe kugira ngo bashobore gufasha abana babo". Atera akamo amashirahamwe afasha abana gushira hamwe inguvu kugira ngo bashobore gufasha aba bana. Asaba reta ko yohimiriza abatware ku nzego zo hasi gukurikirana abana babo, bakamenya iyo buri mwana ari.

column2: Papa Francis ati: 'Imana idukunda twese, n’aho woba uri umunyakibi ruhebwa'
column3: Papa Francis yahimbaje umunsi mukuru wa Noel avuga ko Imana idukunda twese - "Ninkozi z'ibibi ruhebwa". Yashikirije iryo jambo imbere y'abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bari mu gisabisho c'ijoro rya Noel kw'isengero rikuru i Vaticano ryitiriwe Umutakatifu Petero. Ati: "Ufise kuba  uri mu vyiyumviro bibi, ufise kuba warakoze ibi ruhebwa…ariko Imana ibandanya igukunda". Hari bamwe babona ko yashikirije ayo majambo afatiye ku mabi yagirizwa bamwe mu barongoye Ekleziya Katolika, harimwo ibijanye n'ugufata ku nguvu, nk'uko bishikirizwa n'umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC. Mu masaha yo ku mugoroba, Papa Francis aza gusubira mw'iyo sengero y'Umutakatifu Petero i Vaticano aho nk'uko vyama aza gushikiriza isi yose ijambo rya Papa risanzwe ryitezwe. Mu bitavye iyo misa harimwo abana batowe mu bihugu, harimwo nka za Venezuela, Irak na Uganda. Umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC i Roma, Mark Lowen, avuga ko vyerekana ko Papa afise ku mutima abakatolika baharurwa mu muliyaridi 1 n'ibice bitatu kw'isi, ashimikiye cane cane ku ngorane zihanze abimukira n'abari mu ntambara kw'isi yose. Uyo mu papa w'imyaka 83 akomoka muri Argentine yavuze ati: "Noel itwibutsa ko Imana ibandanya itwereka urukundo idufitiye, n'aho twoba turi abanyavyaha ruhebwa. Kuri jewe, ku muntu uwo ari we wese, uno munsi itubwira iti: 'Ndagukunda kandi nzokwama ndagukunda, kuko mu maso yanje uri ngirakamaro'". Imana ntigukunda kubera wiyumvira ugakora ivyiza. Igukunda ataco irabiyeko, vyonyene gusa. Urukundo rwayo ntiruva ku kungene umeze". Papa yanacishijemwo n'ibijanye n'amabi avugwa muri Ekleziya, hamwe n'isesagurwa ry'umutungo wa Ekleziya. Ati: "Nimba hari ibitagenda neza mu buzima bwacu, nimba hari ibitagenda neza muri Ekleziya, n'aho hoba ibibazo bimeze gute kw'isi, ivyo ntibizotubera inyendamuvano". Kuva mu bisagara vya Australia gushika mu mashure muri Irlande eka mbere no mu bisagara vya Amerika, Ekleziya Katolika yarahuye n'ibibazo vy'abayirongoye bagirizwa gufata ku nguvu abana kuva mu myaka mirongo iheze. Hari ibirego bikomeye n'abantu batanga ivyemezo vy'ivyo vyaha vyavuzwe cane mu matohoza abandanya akorwa. Mu biheruka, umukardinali wa Australia George Pell yarakubiswe intahe mu gahanga na sentare ko yafashe ku nguvu uduhungu tubiri two mu gisagara ca Melbourne muri Australia mu 1996. Uyo mukardinali yanahoze ajejwe ubutunzi i Vaticano - bisigura ko yaboneka nk'umutegetsi agira gatatu muri Ekleziya - niwe mutegetsi mukuru wa Ekleziya muri Australia yagirijwe ico caha. Mu ndwi iheze, Papa yarakoze impinduka zikomeye cane mu guhindura ibijanye "n'ibanga ry'ubupapa" ryatumye ivyo guhohotera abana vyakorwa n'abategetsi ba Ekleziya bisasirwa indava muri kahise. Imbere y'aho, Ekleziya yaragira ibanga ibijanye n'ugufata abana ku nguvu, mu vyafatwa ko kwari ukugerageza kugumiriza ibanga ababikorewe n'ababikoze. Ariko, ingingo nshasha yarakuyeho izo nzitizi zahora zibuza abantu kumenyesha ivyababayeko, canke ababibakoreye. Papa Francis agize iminsi atoroherezwa kuko hari benshi bamusaba gufata ingingo ruhasha kugira ngo arwanye ako kabi kiziziye Ekleziya muri ino myaka ya vuba.

column2: Umugambi wa UK wo kurungika abimukira mu Rwanda uteye kubiri 'na kamere y'Imana' - Welby
column3: Umukuru w'ishengero ry'Ubwongereza (Church of England), Justin Welby, kuri uyu wa Mungu yaneguye umugambi wa Reta y'Ubwongereza wo kurungika mu Rwanda abarondera ubuhungiro. Uyu Musenyeri mukuru wa Canterbury avuga ko uwu mugambi "uteye kubiri na kamere y'Imana". Mu nyigisho yiwe ya Pasika, Justin Welby yavuze ko igihe c'izuka rya Yesu Kristu/Yesu Kristo atari ico "kuremeka inshingano zacu abandi". Reta ivuga ko ari ngombwa ko haba impinduka kugira bakingire ubuzima bw'abantu ntibagurishwe.l Muri uwu mugambi w'imiriyoni 120 z'amapadundi (hafi imiriyoni 157 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika)  - watangajwe muri ino ndwi - abantu bafatwa ko binjiye mu Bwongereza bidaciye mu mategeko bazotwarwa muri iki gihugu c'Urwanda, ari ho bazokwemererwa gusabira uburenganzira bwo kuja kuba muri ico gihugu. Iyi ngingo iriyamirizwa bikomeye, aho amashirahamwe atabara abatishoboye arenga 160 ariko asaba abashikiranganji guhagarika ico bita poritike "y'ubugome". Eka n'imigambwe itavuga rumwe n'uwuri ku butegetsi mu Bwongereza na bamwe mu bagendera ku vyiyumviro vya kera (Conservatives) baranegura iyi ngingo. Mw'ijambo yashikirije ku Rusengero rukuru rwa Canterbury kuri uno musi wa Mungu wa Pasika, Musenyeri Welby yavuze ko  hari "ibibazo bikomeye bitewe n'irungikwa ry'abasaba ubuhungiro mu mahanga". Yongerako ati: "Ibisigaye ni ivya poritike n'abanyaporitike. Ica ngenderwako n'uko vyoba ari vyiza mu maso y'Imana. Ariko siko bimeze. " ...kandi ntibihuye n'inshingano zacu nk'igihugu kigendera ku ndangagaciro k'aba-Kristu: kuko kuremeka abandi inshingano zacu, naho hoba ari ku gihugu kirondera ineza nk'Urwanda, ni igihushane ca kamere k'Imana, kuko yo nyene ubwayo yaremeye kwiremeka ibitunanira". Ubushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati yashigikiye uwu mugambi bufatiye ku majambo yo kunegura yavuzwe n'uyu musenyeri, bukavuga ko Ubwongereza "bwishimira kahise kabwo" ko gufasha abo bose babikeneye, kandi ko n'imigambi yo guha ubuhungiro ababukeneye wafashije ibihumbi amajana n'amajana kuronka "inzira nziza kandi zemewe n'amategeko zo kwubaka kazoza kabo". Umuvugizi w'ubwo bushikiranganji avuga ati: "Hagati aho, isi irahanzwe n'ikibazo c'abimukira ku rugero rutari bwigere rubaho rero hakenewe impinduka kugira ngo abantu babi bashora abantu bareke gushira ubuzima bw'abantu mu kaga hanyuma n'ikibazo c'abarondera ubuhungiro kw'isi cananiraye gitorerwe umuti". Ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati buvuga ko Urwanda "rutekanye" kandi ko ruzokwiga abasaba ubuhungiro hisunzwe amategeko mpuzamakungu akingira uburenganzira bwa kiremwamuntu. Amasendika y'abakozi ba reta avuga ko iyi ngingo ari "iy'ubunyamaswa" ariko ko abategetsi bazotegerezwa kuyishira mu ngiro canke naho bakagenda. Ku wa kane, Ubwongereza n'Urwanda vyashize ahabona amasezerano mashasha azotuma bamwe mu barondera ubuhungiro bazoronswa gusa itike y'indege yo kugenda bakaja muri ico gihugu. column2: Amakuru ku ntambara ya Russia na Ukraine: Uburusiya bugabisha Uburengero ku ngaruka zititezwe
column3: Uburusiya bwagabishije ku mugaragaro Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika - n'ibindi bihugu bicuditse nazo - ku mugambi wavyo wo guha ibirwanisho Ukraine. Iri gabisha ryacishijwe mu rwandiko rw'igisata kijejwe imigenderanire i Moscou, ikopi ikaba yashitse mu minwe y'ibinyamakuru muri Amerika. Uru rwandiko rw'impapuro zibiri - ibiro vy'ubuserukizi vy'Uburusiya i Washington bikaba vyarurungikiye ibiro vy'umunyamabanga wa reta ya Amerika ajejwe imigenderanire  - rugabisha ko ingendo ya Amerika na OTAN/NATO yo kurungika ibirwanisho muri Ukraine "isongera isibe" kuri iyi ngwano ya Ukraine, igashobora gutuma haba ivyo abajejwe imigenderanire b'Uburusiya bita "ingaruka zitari zitezwe". Rwarungitswe ku wa kabiri, igihe bitanguye kumenyekana ko Amerika igomba ihe Ukraine iyindi mfashanyo ya gisirikare. Haciye amasaha makeya gusa, Perezida Joe Biden akaba yaciye atera igikumu kw'itegeko ritanga uburenganzira bwo kurungika  imfashanyo ya gisirikare ingana n'imiriyoni 800 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika - harimwo, ubu bukaba ari bwo bwa mbere,  ibirwanisho rutura birasa kure nk'ivyitwa howitzers - ni mu ntumbero yo guha Ukraine inguvu za gisirikare zingana n'iz'Uburusiya muri ico gihugu. Umutegetsi mukuru wo mu butegetsi bwa Amerika yasubiwemwo avuga ko iri gabisha rishobora gufatwa nk'icemezo c'uko Uburusiya bwemera ko imfashanyo ya Amerika na OTAN kuri Ukraine yabaye ngirakamaro. Igice ca mbere c'iyi mfashanyo citezwe gushika muri Ukraine mu misi mike iri imbere, mu gihe ingabo z'Uburusiya zibandanya kwitegura mu buseruko bw'ico gihugu, imbere y'igitero gikomeye citezwe mu ntara irwanirwa  cane ya Donbas muri Ukraine mu ndwi nkeya ziri imbere. Kuva intambara itanguye, Amerika imaze guha Ukraine imfashanyo ya gisirikare ifise agaciro k'imiriyaridi zirenga zitatu z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky wa Ukraine avuga ko ingabo za Ukraine zishika 3000 zimaze gupfa, abarenga 10.000 nabo bakaba bamaze gukomereka kuva igitero gitangura. Yabivugiye mu kiganiro yagiranye n'imboneshakure CNN yo muri Amerika, aho avuga ko abari hagati ya 2500 na 3000 bamaze gupfa, ari naho yaciye agabisha ko Uburusiya bushobora gukora igitero ca nikleyeri. Haraciye ukwezi Zelensky avuze ko ingabo za Ukraine zababa 1500 zari zimaze kuhasiga ubuzima. Ariko, aho hose yama avuga ko Abarusiya basumba kure ivyo bitigiri vy'abamaze gupfa. BBC ubwayo ntirashobora guhinyuza ibi bitigiri bitarimwo abasivire. Impande zompi zama zitangaza ibitigiri vyo ku rundi ruhande vy'abo zimaze kwica - akenshi bikaba ari ivy'umurengera bisumba kure cane ibitangazwa n'urudi ruhande. Isi yoba iritegurira ko Uburusiya bushobora kuzotera Ukraine bukoresheje ikirwanisho ca nikleyeri, nk'uko vyaraye bivuzwe na Perezida Zelensky. Zelensky yari abajijwe na CNN  nimba yari afise ubwoba ku biherutse kuvugwa n'umukuru wa CIA, aho ku wa kane yavuze ko Uburusiya bushobora guhindura amayeri bugakoresha ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri. "Si jewe gusa - ni isi yose, ibihugu vyose bitegerezwa kuba maso kuko ishobora kuba atari inkuru yo, ariko ishobora kuba ari ukuri", niko Zelensky avuga, mu majambo make y'icongereza yakoresheje kugira ngo ashimangire. Abandanya ati: "Ni ngombwa ko twiyumvira aho gutinya, ntidutinye ahubwo twitegure. Ariko ico si ikibazo ca Ukraine - si Ukraine gusa - ariko ni ikibazo c'isi yose, niko nibaza". Mu kwezi guheze, umuvugizi wa Kremlin yavuze ko Uburusiya bushobora kwikora ku birwanisho vya nikleyeri gusa mu gihe vyoboneka ko ukubaho kwabwo kubangamiwe. Zelensky kandi yabajijwe ku bwato rutura bw'intambara bw'Uburusiya bwazamye, buzwi nka Moskva, ariko yariyubaye ku makuru avuga ko ubu bwato bwatewe misire zibiri za ukrane. "Ico tuzi ni uko butakibaho. Kuri twebwe, ni ikirwanisho gikomeye cane kibangamiye igihugu cacu, rero izama ryabwo ntabwo ritubabaje. "Mu gihe Uburusiya bwokehanirwa n'ibirwanisho bukoresha mu kudutera, yoba ari amahirwe kuri twebwe". Mw'ijambo yaraye ashikirije mu masaha yitereye y'ijoro ryakeye, avuga ko bigoye kumenya igihe iyi ntambara izomara. Ati: " Nivyo, ndumva kandi ibitandukanye bivugwa. Mfise amakuru menshi gusumba ibinyamakuru bimwe bimwe ku bijanye n'intumbero n'ubushobozi igisirikare c'Uburusiya gifise. "Ku bijanye na kazoza k'ubutunzi bw'Uburusiya. Kubijanye n'ingene abanyagihugu biyumva mu Burusiya". Avuga ko hari ibintu bibiri bizokwerekana igihe intambara izomara. Avuga ati: "Ingene abasirikare bacu bazovyifatamwo neza ni ikintu gikomeye. "Ni ikintu nyamukuru mu mateka yacu. Ariko ntigikwiye kugira ngo twomore abigaruriye ubutaka bwacu. Ariko tuzobakubita". "Ibihano ku Burusiya ni ikintu gikomeye cane. Bihungabanya ubutunzi. Ariko ntigikwiye kugira ngo igisirikare c'Uburusiya kibure ibikibeshaho. Dukeneye ibirwanisho bikomeye, bishobora kubasambura". Yongerako ati: "Umuntu avuze ati: umwaka canke myaka, nishura nti: intambara urashobora kuyigira nto gusumba. Ni twaronka hakiri kare ibirwanisho binini twasavye, niho tuzogira inguvu kandi niho tuzoshobora kugarukana amahoro vuba". Umugwa mukuru wa Ukraine wazindutse uterwa amabombe nk'uko bivugwa n'umukuru w'igisagara. Mu butumwa yacishije kuri Instagram, Vitali Klitschko yavuze ko aya mabombe yatewe mu karere ka Darnytskyi kari ku nkengera y'igisagara. Yongera ko y'uko igitigiri c'abapfuye n'abakomeretse kitazwi kandi ko abajejwe ibikorwa vy'ubutabazi bari aho vyabereye. Nk'uko vyagenze kuri Kyiv, ibibombe kandi vyumvikanye mu gisagara ca Lyiv kiri mu burengero bwa Ukraine muri aka gatondo. Mu butumwa yacishije kuri app ya Telegram, buramatari Maksym Kozytskyi yavuze ko habaye igitero c'indege hagati y'isaha cumi n'imwe n'iminoa 46 (05:46) n'isaha imwe n'iminota ibiri (07:02 ) mu masaha y'aho muri ico gihugu. Avuga ko abajejwe gucungera ikirere ba Ukraine bariko barakora, ariko akaba atatomoye ku hatewe iyo mabombe, hamwe n'abakomeretse canke bakahasiga ubuzima.

column2: Tottenham 0-2 Chelsea: Rudiger wa Chelsea avuga ko yatyojwe kubera ari umwirabure
column3: Ishirahamwe ry'abakinyi b'umupira w'amaguru mu Bwongereza (PFA ) risaba leta y'ico gihugu gukora amahotoza kw'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba ryakorewe umukinyi wa Chelsea mu rukino rw'ejo ku wa Mungu . Vyabaye ngombwa ko umuhagarikizi w'urwo rukino Anthony Taylor ahagarika urukino umwanya muto  mu gice ca kabiri inyuma y'aho umukinyi w'inyuma wa Chelsea, umwirabure Antonio Rudiger amenyeshereje ko yariko yumva abantu bamuririmbira indirimbo zamwita ko ari inguge. Tottenham ivuga ko "izofata ingingo zikomeye zishoboka" kandi ko  izokora amatohoza "amatohoza akomeye". Iyo ngendo y'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba yagiye kwibonekeza inyuma y'aho umukinyi w'imbere wa Tottenham Son Heung-min aherewe ikarata itukura  kw'ikosa yakoreye Rudiger  n'ibigirankana. Ibintu bikaba vyayangaye inyuma y'aho hari ibintu vyatewe umunyegori wa Chelsea Kepa Arrizabalaga. Inyuma y'aho umuhagarikizi ahagarikiye urukino, hasohowe itangazo mu kibuga ryagabisha ko "hari ingendo y'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba ririko rirahungabanya urukino". Iryo tangazo ryasohowe incuro zitatu zose. PFA  ivuga ko yababajwe cane n'iryo tyozwa ryisubiriza mw'ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Bwongereza, Premier League. PFA ivuga iti: "Biraboneka ko abakinyi bariko bahura n'ingorane zikomeye z'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba ririko rifata umurindi ukomeye mu Bwongereza, n'aho atari bo bonyene". "PFA yifatanije umubabaro n'umukinyi wese ariko ahura n'ibibazo vy'ivangura. Kw'izina ryabo, tuzobandanya urugamba rwo kurwanya ako kabi". "Football ni kimwe mu biranga Abongereza - hamwe n'isinzi ry'abakunzi bayo mu mpande zose z'isi, ni igikorwa cacu rero co kurwanya ako kabi ata kigongwe". PFA isaba "ibigo vyose vya leta" hamwe "n'abo bose bafise uruhara mu mupira w'amaguru" gukorera hamwe kugira ngo bahangane, barwanye kandi barandurane n'imizi ityozwa rishingiye ku rukoba mu bibuga eka no mu bindi bisata vy'igihugu. PFA isaba kandi leta gukora amatohoza ku bijanye n'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba mu mupira w'amaguru. Ku ruhande rwayo, Tottenham imenyesha ko izokorana na Chelsea n'abakinyi bayo kugira bihwereze hamwe ivyashikiye umukinyi wa Chelsea. Mw'itangazo uyo murwi wasohoye, uvuga uti: "Ivangura iryo ari ryo ryose ntirishobora kwihanganirwa mu bibuga vyacu". "Ivyabaye tugiye kubikorerako n'ishaka rinini kandi tuzofatira ingingo ruhasha umuntu uwo ari we wese azoboneka ko yagize inyifato nk'iyo, harimwo n'ukumubuza gusubira kwinjira mu bibuga". Rudiger avuga ko ari ibintu bibabaje kubona hari abantu bakirangwa n'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba mu rukino rw'umupira w'amaguru. Ati: "Ni ibiterasoni kubona mu mwaka wa 2019 hacibonekeza ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba. None ubu bujuju buzohera ryari?" Ivyashikiye Rudiger nijoro bibaye inyuma y'umwaka umukinyi wa Manchester City, Raheem Sterling na we nyene atyojwe kubera ari umwirabure kuri ico kibuga nyene ca Chelsea mu kwa 12 2018. Ivyo vyatumye umufana wa Chelsea umwe afatirwa ingingo yo kutazigera asubira kwinjira mu kibuga".

column2: Australia: 'Abanyamahanga batubahiriza amategeko ya Covid bazirukanwa'
column3: Umushikiranganji ajejwe abimukira muri Australia yavuze ko abanyamahanga bazofatwa bariko bararenga ku mategeko ajanye n'amagara y'abantu bashobora gusubizwa iwabo. Alex Hawke yavuze ko yababajwe cane n'ivyo yabonye kuri 'beach' ya Bronte i Sydney ku musi wa Noheli. Video y'abantu benshi yashizwe ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi yerekana urwaruka ruririmba rwongera rutamba, rurenze ku mategeko yo kugwanya coronavirus. Bamwe mu babiboneye bavuze ko benshi bari abongereza. Ingabo zidasanzwe za Australia zagirizwa kwica abasivire muri Afghanistani Uko inyoni ya gasuku yarokoye nyirayo wari ugiye guhira mu nzu Virusi ya Covid imara 'iminsi 28 itarapfa' muri 'laboratoire' Australia iri mu rugamba rwo kugwanya ico kiza giherutse kwongerekana inyuma y'amezi atari make ata muntu abonetse yanduriye mu gihugu hagati. Iyaduka bushasha bw'uwo mugera indwi imwe imbere ya Noheli ryatumye hasubira gushirwaho ayandi mategeko yo kwikingira muri ico gisagara, harimwo kubuza amakoraniro menshi mu biruhuko no kwiyugarana mu karere kamerewe nabi ka Northern Beaches. Ubu abamaze gufatwa muri iryo yongerekana ry'ico kiza bashika 129. Hawke yabwiye radio Sydney ati:"Mu gihe umuntu ageramiye umutekano w'abantu c'anke amagara, viza yiwe ishobora gufutwa ." Yavuze ko yasavye ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu gukorana n'abategetsi ba New South Wales (NSW) muri iyi misi himirije umwaka mushasha kugira ngo umuntu wese azofatwa "akora ibintu bidakurikije amategeko", viza yiwe izoce isubira kwihwezwa na reta. Yavuze ko benshi mu bafise viza z'akanya gato bubahiriza amategeko y'amagara y'abantu. Igipolisi kivuga ko ata n'umwe mu bari mu musi mukuru i Bronte yaciwe amande canke ngo ahanwe. Australia yarugaye imbibe ku bantu nka bose kiretse ku benegihugu batashe canke abafise uruhusha rwo kuba muri ico gihugu n'imiryango yabo mu kwezi kwa gatatu. Mu kwezi kwa kane, reta yavuze ko hariyo abantu barenga imiliyoni zibiri bafise viza y'umwanya muto muri ico gihe.

column2: Covid mu minsi iri imbere izoba ari nk'ibicurane - Abashakashatsi
column3: Covid iri mu nzira yo gucika nk'ibicurane abantu basanzwe bamenyereye, nk'uko bivugwa n'abahinga babiri, abigisha bo kuri kaminuza ya Oxford Sir John Bell na Dame Sarah Gilbert, ari nabo batoye urucanco rwa Oxford-AstraZeneca. Ku mugera  washegeshe isi nk'uko, ivyo  abo bahinga bavuze bishobora kwumvikana nko kwubahuka cane. Ariko ico ibiza  vyabaye muri kahise vyerekana n'uko umugera utera mu mipfunda. Imipfunda ya mbere iba ikomeye cane, bigatera kurwara ukaremba, ariko mu nyuma umugera ukagenda woroha. Ivyo ntibivuze ko umugera uba wazimanganye, ahubwo ni ukubera ubudahangarwa tuba twubatse mu mubiri buheza bukagabanura ingaruka. Ubukari bw'ukurwara kwandurutse kuri uwo mugera buragabanuka cane n'ubwo tuguma dusubira kwandura kenshi kenshi. Incanco zakozwe ziduha ubushobozi bwo kwigwanira, izo ncanco zikigisha umubiri kumenya kugwanya uwo mugera. Ubukomezi bw'urukingo burashobora kugenda buragabanuka uko umwanya uhera, ariko buguma bukomeye bihagije kugira burinde umurwayi kuremba. Ivyo bisigura ko n'ubwo dushobora  kuja turandura kenshi muri kazoza, ukurwara bishobora kudakomera cane kuri benshi gutyo bigatuma ukwigwanira kw'umubiri kuguma kwinagura. Uko biboneka ku yindi migera, abantu bageze kure mu zabukuru  n'abafise umubiri utagishoboye kwirwanira neza bazoguma bafise ivyago vyinshi vyo gusinzikazwa n'iyo ndwara. Nico gituma bashobora gusubira gucandagwa muri kazoza. Ibi ntibivuze ko ata bantu bazosubira kwicwa na Covid - n'ibicurane bikaze mu gihe c'imbeho (hiver/winter) biracashoboye guhitana abantu bashika ibihumbi 25 - ahubwo izoshika ku rugero rw'aho iba nk'iyisanzwe  mu bantu. Ikibazo gikomeye n'ukumenya ryari tuzoshika aho.

column2: Ibanki nkuru y’u Burundi igabisha amashirahamwe acuruza amafaranga atisunze amategeko
column3: Umuyobozi w'igisata kijejwe kugenzura amabanki mw'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu c'u Burundi, Prosper Ngendanganya, asaba amashirahamwe acuruza amafaranga kwubahiriza amategeko yashinzwe n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu. Ni inyuma y'umubonano hagati y'iyo banki n'amashirahamwe agura akagurisha amafaranga wabaye  ku munsi wa kane w'iyi ndwi mu ntumbero y'ukwibutsa ayo mashirahamwe amategeko mashasha n'igituma adakurikizwa. Ku wa 17 z'ukwezi kw'icenda uno mwaka, ibanki nkuru y'igihugu, BRB, yasohoye itegeko rishasha rigenga urucuruza rw'amafaranga mu ntumbero y'ukurwanya abikika mu kiza bakagura bakanagurisha ku biciro vy'umurengera amafaranga y'agaciro. Mw'itangazo yasohoye ejo ku wa gatanu, bwana Ngendakumana yaragabishije ko amashirahamwe n'amazu acuruza amafaranga y'agaciro adakurikije amategeko azofatwa nk'ayahungabanya umutekano w'igihugu. Avuga ko ishirahamwe rizofatwa ririko riragurisha ibiciro ry'ishakiye ko rizofatwa nk'umwansi w'igihugu kandi ko rizohanwa hisunzwe igatabu mpanavyaha. Ibanki nkuru y'igihugu imenyesha kandi ko urudandazwa rutemewe n'amategeko (marché noir) rw'amafaranga y'agaciro rwasubiye kwibonekeza cane cane mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. BRB ikababazwa n'uko ayo mashirahamwe adashaka gufasha mu kwerekana abo badandaza bo mu kinyegero bakora batubahiriza ibiciro biba vyashinzwe na BRB. Mu rugamba rwo kurwanya urudandazwa ruteye kubiri n'amategeko, ibanki nkuru y'igihugu yaremereye agashirukabute umuntu azoshobora kwerekana ishirahamwe canke inzu izogura canke izogurisha amafaranga y'agaciro hatisunzwe iryo tegeko rishasha, aho azoronswa ibihumbi 500 vy'amafaranga y'amarundi. Ni mu gihe uwuzokwerekana umuntu canke ishirahamwe rikora ritazwi n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu nawe azorosnwa ibice 10 kw'ijana (10%) vy'amafaranga yose azoba afashwe. Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyahora bifasha u Burundi vyahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco, bituma kani amafaranga y'agaciro akena.

column2: Umupasitori aregwa gusambanya umukenyezi ku nguvu muri Nigeria yatanze imihoho mu mabanga yo kurongora ishengero.
column3: Uyo mupastori asayangana , Biodun Fatoyinbo yari amaze imisi avugwa mu makuru iyi misi itatu iheze, inyuma yaho umukenyezi azwi cane mu gufata amafoto amwagiririje ko yamusambanije ku nguvu incuro zibiri imbere y'uko ashikana imyaka cumi n'umunani, haheze imyaka irenga cumi. Uyo mu pastori w'ishengero bita COZA rikundwa cane mu gisagara Abuja yanditse ku rubuga ngurukana bumenyi rwa Instagram kuri uyu musi wa mbere  ko yatanze imihoho mu mabanga yiwe kubera iyo nkuru yavuzwe cane. Hari abari bakoze  imyiyerekano mu mpera z'iyindwi mu bisagara bikuru bibiri vy'igihugu ca Nigeria arivyo Lagos na  Abuja. Basabira  ubutungane Busola Dakolo inyuma yaho amasanamu y'uwo mukenyezi  akwiragirijwe cane  ku mbuga  ngurukana bumenyi , avuga ko uyo mupastori yamusambanije ku nguvu. Uyo mu pastori wewe arabihakana. Igipolisi camenyesheje ko kitaramenya ibirego umukenyezi Dakolo yagirije uyo mu pastori  kandi ko ata muntu n'umwe arashikana ibirego nk'ivyo imbere y'ababijejwe. Igihugu ca Nigeria gifise abapastori benshi b'amasengero yemera Kristu y'abapentekoti, bamwe mu bapastori bakunze kwagirizwa kugira  inyifato itabereye.

column2: EU: Indangamuntu ya Covid-19 yoba isigura iki ku ngenzi?
column3: Indangamuntu nshasha ya Covid mw'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya (EU), Digital Covid Certificate/Certificat COVID numérique - "indangamuntu" y'iri shirahamwe yerekana ko waronse urucanco - iriko iratanguzwa hose mu bihugu 27 vy'iri shirahamwe. Ni nde ayifitiye uburenganzira, yoba isigura iki ku ngenzi? Ni uburyo bw'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya bwerekana ko abanyagihugu: Ibihugu vyose 27 vy'iri shirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya - co kimwe no mu bihugu vy'Ubuswisi, Iceland/Islande, Norvège na  Liechtenstein - birayifise kandi birayemera. Itangwa ku buntu - kandi abanyagihugu ba EU, co kimwe n'abanyamahanga baba muri ibi bihugu vya EU mu mategeko (bakaba bafise uburenganzira bwo gutembera mu bindi bihugu vyo muri iri shirahamwe) bashobora kuyivoma (download) bakayigumana kuri ngendanwa zabo, canke barakonswa urukaratasi rw'ikopi. Hari ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyari vyamaze gutangura kuyikoresha ku gushaka kwavyo - ariko rero ku wa 01 z'uku kw'indwi niho yatanguzwa icese, mu kiringo c'amezi atandatu. Izoba ifise code QR hamwe n'urupfunguruzo nyabwonko (digital signature key/clé de signature numérique) umuntu yisangije, ibi bikazoshoboza umuntu kwinjira mu bubiko yisangije burimwo amakuru yose ajanye n'incanco yaronse - nk'akarorero ibitaro, ikigo canke urwego rwamuhaye uru rucanco. Amakuru y'umuntu yisangije azoguma kuri iyi ndangamuntu yiwe, ntazobikwa canke ngo agumanwe, nk'akarorero ku kibuga c'indege, mu gihe bazoba bahejeje guhinyuza ko ari ay'ukuri. Abantu barizeye ko iyi ndangamuntu izokworohereza ingenzi gutembera mu bihugu vy'ishiramahwe EU. Ntabwo ari igitabo c'inzira - ingenzi izotegerezwa kuba igifise canke urundi rukaratasi urwo ari rwo rwose rwerekana ibiyiranga. Gusa, umuntu uwo ari we wese azoba afise iyi ndangamuntu, mu bisanzwe azoba arekuriwe kwinjira mu gihugu ico ari co cose atarinze gupimwa canke kubanza gutaramurwa mu kiringo kanaka. Si co kimwe - ariko zompi zerekana amakuru amwe kandi zifise intumbero imwe yo kwerekana ingene umuntu ahagaze ku bijanye na Covid. Ishirahamwe EU ntiriremeza Covid Pass, ariko ibihugu ku gatwe kavyo, nk'akarorero Ubugiriki na Espagne, biramaze kuyemera. EU ivuga ko iriko irakora uko ishoboye kwose kugira ngo iyi ndangamuntu ise n'izindi z'ibihugu bitari muri EU. Mu bisanzwe nta ngorane ihari. Hari incanco zine zose zemewe mu Bwongereza no mu bihugu vyo muri EU  - gusa hari zitatu mu zemewe mu Bwongereza rimwe na rimwe zizwi ku mazina atandukanye, ariko ni zimwe. Muri EU: Ariko, Oxford-AstraZeneca (AZ) yahinguwe n'ikigo Serum Institute co mu Buhindi (SII) ifise irindi zina rigira gatatu - Covishield. N'aho ari co kimwe n'iyo yahinguriwe i Bulaya, ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya ntiriyemera. None hari ingorane kubona Covishield itemewe ku mugabane wa Bulaya? Covishield irakoreshwa cane mu bihugu bikenye biciye muri wa mugambi mpuzamakungu w'incanco uzwi nka Covax, ubu hakaba hari impungenge ko iyi ndangamuntu ya Bulaya ishobora kutemera ingenzi ziva muri ivyo bihugu. Ikigo ca Bulaya kijejwe imiti, European Medicines Agency/Agence européenne des médicaments (EMA) ntigitegerezwa kubanza kwemeza ikigo c'Ubuhindi gihingura Oxford-AstraZeneca, kubera ata ncanco ziva muri ico gihugu zinjira muri EU. Ariko ikigo Serum Institute kivugwa ko coba kibanza gusaba uruhusha muri EU kugira ngo gishobore guhingura Covishield. Ikigo AstraZeneca kandi kivuga ko kiriko kirakorana na EMA kugira ngo barabe ko "Covishield nayo yokwemerwa kuja muri izi ndangamuntu z'incanco". Gusa EMA ivuga ko gushika ubu itarigera ironka igisabo ico ari co cose kirondera ko uru rucanco rwemerwa. N'ubwo uru rucanco rutemewe gukoreshwa mw'ishirahamwe rya Bulaya, ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu OMS ryaremeje ko rushobora gukoreshwa mu buryo bwihutirwa - kandi n'ishirahamwe rya Bulaya rivuga ko ibihugu vyaryo ku giti cavyo bishobora kwemerera ingenzi kwinjira mu gihe bahawe urucanco rwa Covishield. Hanyuma kandi, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyari bisanzwe vyemera izindi ncanco - nk'akarorero Ubugiriki buremera urucanco rw'Ubushinwa Sinovac, urucanco rw'Uburusiya Sputnik V hamwe n'izindi zitari nke. Urwego rukuru rushinzwe amagara y'abantu muri Afrika ruranegura cane ingingo y'Ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya yo gukura ku rutonde ingenzi zahawe incanco za AstraZeneca zakorewe mu Buhindi mu mugambi w'iyi ndangamuntu ya Covid. Umukuru w'ikigo ca Afrika kijejwe kurwanya indwara Centres for Disease Control and Prevention, John Nkengasong, avuga ko ingingo y'Ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya itisunze ubuhinga n'amakuru yerekana ingene incanco zakorewe mu Buhindi zihagaze, kandi ata cerekana ko zidakora neza uzigereranije n'iza Bulaya.

column2: Intambara yo muri Ukraine: Russia iriyamiriza US iyagiriza ubumenja
column3: Uwuserukira Uburusiya muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika Anatoly Antonov ariyamiriza amajambo yashikirijwe n'umuvugizi wa Pentagone John Kirby aho yagirije Perezida Vladimir Putin ko akora ibikorwa vy'ubumenja mu gitero kuri Ukraine. Ku wa gatanu mw'ijoro, Kirby yahatswe gukorora amosozi igihe yabaza ingene umuntu wese "akomeye mu mutwe" yoshobora gusigura amabi akorwa n'Uburusiya. Yongeyeko ati: "Sinibaza ko hari umuntu yokwishimira na gato urugero rw'ubukozi bw'ibiki n'ubugome [vya Putin]". Mu butumwa bwiwe yacishije ku mbuga hwaniro, Antonov avuga ko amajambo ya Kirby ari "igitutsi kandi ko adashobora kwihanganirwa". Ati: "Bimaze kuba umugenzo hano ko abategetsi bashikiriza amajambo ashingiye ku binyoma bitangwa n'abategetsi ba Ukraine". Uyu muserukizi w'Uburusiya avuga kandi y'uko Amerika idashaka ko intambara yo muri Ukraine irangira. "Ikiraje ishinga John Kirby na bagenziwe ni uko inganda za gisirikare za Amerika ziyegeraniriza amafaranga mu kwikurako ibirwanisho vyazo bishaje". Arangiza avuga ko Kirby "yatakaje icizere nk'umutegetsi wa Amerika, mu gukoresha ibitutsi vyo mw'ibarabara".

column2: Abaguzi b'ibinyobwa vya Brarudi mu Burundi basaba guhumurizwa
column3: Nyuma y'aho leta ivugiye ko atacatitutse mu buryo ishirahamwe Brarudi rihingura ibinyobwa vyaryo, ababifata amakenga ntarahera kuko akanovera katakiri kakandi. Ikigo ca leta y'u Burundi kijejwe kugenzura ubuziranenge bw'ibidandazwa, BBN giheruka kumenyesha ko naho akanovera k'ibinyobwa vya Brarudi koba katakiri nka mbere, ngo ntacatitutse ku buryo bihingurwa. Ariko abafata ivyo binyobwa ntibashize amakenga, imyidogo ikaba ikiri ya yindi mu gihe bobo bafashe ivyo binyobwa bumva neza ko "bitakiryoshe" nka mbere. Haca rero haza umwitwarariko wo kumenya niba ivyo binyobwa bisa n'ivyahindutse ata ngaruka vyobagirako naho leta isa n'iyihumuriza. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'abaguzi mu Burundi, Pierre Nduwayo, yabwiye BBC ko vyumvikanye ko ivyo binyobwa bifise icahindutse. Yagize ati: "Biboneka mu nzoga, twaratanguye kuvyumva cane cane nko muri za Royale (Amstel), hamwe n'amafana. "Ivyo n'imbere y'uko umushikiranganji abishikiriza imyidogo y'abaguzi twari tumaze kuyumva. Kandi na twebwe ubisomye urumva ko akanovera kahahora gasa n'akahindutse." Bwana Nduwayo yabandanije avuga ko Brarudi mu bisanzwe yahora inyaruka mu gushikiriza ibijanye n'ibinyobwa vyayo ariko ko ubu ataco iravuga. Yagize ati: "Brarudi twari dusazanzwe tuzi ko ari ishirahmwe rikunda kuza riramenyesha ibintu vyabo aho bihagaze n'ubwo hoba hari ingorane bakazishikiriza. "Ariko kuva iyo myidogo itanguye bari mu gacerere ntangere, ni naco gituma twovuga duti ahubwo nibave muri ako gacerere  bashikirize nabo kuri ayo magenga abaguzi boba bafise..." Uwo aserukiye abaguzi yabandanije avuga ko naho leta ivuga ko ata ngorane zihara, akanovera gafise akamaro kanini mu gutuma abaguzi bahurumbira ikidandazwa ico ari co cose. Rero ngo naho boba bababwira ko ata ngorane kandi bumva ako kanovera karahindutse, ntibibuza ko bagira amakenga.

column2: Yegereyegere "Kwa Siyoni": Abajejwe iryo soko ntibavuga rumwe n'abarikoreramwo
column3: Abadandariza mw'isoko rya Bujumbura City Market rizwi nko kwa Siyoni barahagaritse ibikorwa vyabo kuva kuri uyu wa kabiri biyamiriza iduzwa ry'amahera yo kuriha ibibanza bakoreramwo  gushika ku ncuro zibiri. Ariko abajejwe iryo soko, bavuga yuko ukwo kuduza ibiciro kwari gukenewe uravye ibihe tugezemwo n'uburyo bwakoreshejwe mu kuvugurura isoko. Umupfasoni umwe muri abo badandaza bavuganye na BBC atashimye kwivuga izina, avuga ko bandikiwe amakete abamenyesha ko kuva itariki 10 z'ukwezi kwa mbere 2022 amahera bahora bariha yadugijwe incuro zibiri. Agira ati: "Batumenyesheje ko kubera ibikorwa vyakozwe muri iryo soko, ko kuva mu kwezi kwa mbere amahera twahora turiha azohinduka. Akarorero abahora bariha ibihumbi 400 ku kwezi bazoriha ibihumbi 750, abahora bariha na bo 188.800 bakazoriha 312.000. Urumva ko bagwijije incuro zibiri zirenga." Ivyo bikorwa bivugwa vyakozwe ngo ni nko kwubaka ahahagarara imiduga, gusiga isima hasi hamwe n'amabombo (robine) azana amazi mu ntumbero yo kwikingira ikiza Covid-19. Abadandariza muri  iyo soko bavuga ko batanka ko ibiciro vyoduga, ariko bagasaba ko habanza kuba inama n'ingingo. BBC yashoboye kuvugana n'uburongozi bw'iryo soko, uwitwa Joseph Dukundane atubwira yuko baravye igihe cari kihaciye amahera ataduzwa kandi ibintu vyarazimvye, hamwe n'ibikorwa vyo kuvugurura isoko baranguye, ngo ukwo kuduza ibiciro kwari gukenewe: Kanda ngaha wumve ico kiganiro.

column2: Muri Tigray 'abantu barasambanijwe ku nguvu''-reta ya Ethiopia
column3: Ethiopia yemeje ivyahora bivugwa ko hari abasambanijwe ku nguvu mu ntambara ya Tigray. Abategetsi ba Ethiopia bemeje ko vyahsitse hakagira abantu basambanywa ku nguvu mu ntambara yabaye mu ntara ya Tigray igihe ingabo za reta mpuzantara zatera umugambwe watwara iyo ntara. Ivyo bibaye inyuma y'aho ONU ivugiye ko yaronse ivyegeranyo vy'amabi afatiye ku gutsina yakozwe muri iyo ntara, harimwo guhatira abantu gusambanya ku nguvu abantu bo mu miryango yabo. "Tumaze kuronka ivyegeranyo vy'umugwi twarungitse gukurikirana ivy'iriya ntara ya Tigray, basanze koko hari abasambanijwe ku nguvu, ivyo bikaba arivyo ata gukekeranya'' nk'uko vyemejwe  n'umushikiranganji w'abagore Filsan Abdullahi avyanditse kuri twitter. Uwo mushikiranganji yavuze ko umugwi ubikurikirana ukiriko uregeranya ibiharuro kugira hamenekanye igitigiri c'abashikiwe n'ayo mahano. Yavuze ko reta iriko 'irongereza ugukingira no kubuza ko haba amabi afatiye ku gitsina mu ntara ya Tigray." Umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy Ahmed yagomoye igitero c'indege no hasi itariki zine z'ukwezi kwa 11 kugira atuze umugabwe watwara iyo ntara inyuma yo  kwigarurira  amakambi yab gisirikare. Yatangaje intsinzi muri Tigray inyuma y'ukwezi kw'intambara, ariko indongozi za TPLF  n'ubwo bararahiye ko bazobandanya kurwana. Gushika muri Tigray kuracari ikibazo ku miryango ifasha abari mu kaga ishaka gutanga imfashanyo y'ivyo kurya hamwe n'imiti bikenewe cane. Amashirahamwe atanga imfashsnyo avuga ko abantu bangana na miriyoni 4.5 bakeneye gufashwa , abo bakaba ari 60% y'abanya Tigray bose, ariko reta ya Ethiopia yo ivuga ko abantu miriyoni 2.5 ari bo bonyene bakeneye imfashanyo kandi ikemeza ko bose ishobora kubashikira. Umukuru w'Umuryango wa Croisx Rouge yo muri Ethiopia uvuga ko 80% y'abanya Tigray n'ubu badashora gushikirwa n'imfashanyo, kandi ko abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bashobora kwicwa n'inzara vuba.

column2: Pablo Escobar: hatowe amafaranga menshi yanyegejwe mu nzu y'uyu yahoze acuruza ibiyayuramutwe
column3: Umuhungwabo w'uwahoze ari rurangiranwa mu rucuruza rw'ibiyayuramutwe Pablo Escobar avuga ko yatoye isashe yuzuye amafaranga angana na miliyoni 18 z'amadolari yari anyegeje mu ruhome rw'imwe mu nzu za se wabo. Nicolás Escobar yabwiye ikinyamakuru co muri Colombia aho bashobora gusanga aya mafaranga mu nzu asanzwe abamwo mu gisagara ca Medellín. Avuga ko atari bwo bwa mbere atoye amafaranga mu bibanza se wabo atashaka kubonamwo umuntu, ni mu gihe uyu Escobar avugwa ko yasize anyegeje amamiliyoni menshi mu mazu yiwe. Yapfuye mu mwaka wa 1993 arashwe n'abapolisi. Igihe yagera kw'isonga ry'umwuga wiwe, Escobar yaramenyekanye ko yari umuntu agira indwi atunze kw'isi yose. Kuva apfuye, hagumye hari ibihuha i Medellín  ko Escobar yanyegeje amatungo yiwe, inyuma y'imyaka iharurwa muri mirongo arwana na leta ya Colombia yashaka kumurungika muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zariko ziramuhiga. Nicolás Escobar yabwiye televiziyo yo muri Colombia Red+ Noticias ko yatoye kandi n'imashini yo kwandika, amatelefone yakorana naza satellite, ikaramu y'inzahabu, kamera hamwe na firime y'amafoto atari bwogeshwe. Ati: "Igihe cose naricara mu cumba co gufungura, nkaraba muri parikingi y'imodoka, nama mbona umugabo yinjira muri ico kibanza agaca agenda". "Umunuko wari muri ico kibanza wari uteye ubwoba. Umunuko wasumvya incuro ijana uwuva mu kintu capfuye". Nicolás Escobar, yari asanzwe aba muri iyo nzu mu myaka itanu iheze, avuga ko amwe mu manoti amaze imyaka mirongo yari yaboze ku buryo atokoreshwa. Mu kiganiro, avuga ko kenshi yama aherekeza se wabo, kandi ko igihe kimwe yigeze kunyuruzwa n'abantu bariko barondera aho Escobar yari yinyegeje. Ati: " Naraborejwe igufa mu kiringo c'amasaha indwi yose. Bamwe mu bakozi banje bakubiswe umusumenu". Escobar yavukiye ahitwa Rionegro muri Colombia mu 1949, akaba yatanguje akarwi kacuruza ibiyayuramutwe mu gisagara ca Medellín mu myaka ya 1970. Mu myaka uru rudandazwa rwari rukomeye cane, aka karwi niko kinjije mu buryo bwa magendo hafi ibice 80% vy'urumogi rwinjijwe muri Amerika. Ubutunzi bwiwe bwamutumye ashirwa ku rutonde rwa Forbes (ikinyamakuru gitangaza amakuru y'ubutunzi) rw'abatunzi ba mbere w'isi mu kiringo c'imyaka indwi yose. Igihe Amerika isohoreye umutahe wo kumurondera, Escobar yararwanye intambara kugira ntashobore gufatwa, aho akarwi kiwe kakoze ibitero ku banyapolitike, abapolisi n'abamenyeshamakuru. Amaze gufatwa mu 1991, Escobar yapfungiwe mw'ibohero yubatswe ku ntumbero we nyene yatanze, yari yataziriwe Katederari (Cathedral), ayo yabandanije agenzura urudandaza rwiwe i Medellín. Muri rusangi, Escobar aharurwako abantu bagera ku 4000 bishwe. Ariko rero, amamuko yiwe y'umuntu yicisha bugufi yatumye amenyekana mu Banyakolombiya batari bake bari bamushigikiye kubera amafaranga menshi yabaha, mbere akaba yarafashije uturere dukenye mu gisagara ca Medellín.

column2: Ferdinand Omanyala: Uwambere mu kunyaruka muri Africa yamara agwana n'igitutu ca kahise
column3: Ferdinand Omurwa Omanyala  ashobora kuba ariwe mugabo anyaruka cane muri Afrika inyuma yo guca umuhigo  kuri uwo mugabane ku metero 100 ariko uwo munya-Kenya aremera ko igihano  yafatiwe mu 2017 kubera ugufata imiti itemewe ku bakinyi kigumiza icijiji ku vyo ashikako. Yirutse amasekunda  9,77 mw'ihiganwa rya Kip   Keino Classic ryabaye ku wa gatandatu i  Nairobi  aca avanaho umwanya wari hejuru w'ama sekunda 9.85 wari wagizwe n'umunya-Afrika y'Epfo Akani Simbine mu kwezi kw'indwi. Uwo mugabo w'imyaka 25 yabwiye BBC Sport Africa ati: "Iyo nirutse nkagira umwanya mwiza cane, abantu baramvuga ariko jewe ndiraba - nta wundi n'umwe nirukira." Umwanya yagize umutuma aba umugabo agira umunani ku rutonde rw'abanyaruka cane kw'isi mu bihe vyose, n'ubwo yarangije ubwa kabiri inyuma y'umunya-Amerika Trayvon Bromell nawe yarushije aho wenyene yari ageze ku masekunda 9,76. Inyuma yo gutangura umwuga wiwe w'ubunonotsi mu 2016, Omanyala  yamaze amezi 14 ari mu bihano inyuma yo gupimwa bigatorwa ko yafashe imiti itemewe, avuga ko wari umuti w'ububabare yafashe. Asigura ko "yagize ivyago vy'ivyashitse. Wari umuti w'ububabare hanyuma bija kugaragara ko warimwo steroid , ivyo nivyo vyatumye mba uwo ndi uyu munsi." "Vyantumye kugira inguvu zo kwivyukiranya, gukomera gusumba - kuko n'ibihe ata munonotsi n'umwe yokwifuza gucamwo - kandi n'icigwa c'uko utofata icarico cose kandi ko utokwizera umuntu n'umwe mu nkino z'ubunonotsi." "Vyarabaye ibihe bigoye cane kuri jewe ariko reka dushire kahise muri kahise. Dutange imbabazi, twibagire hanyuma dukomeze. Jewe ndi umuntu mbaho nkurikije aho ibintu bigeze. Rwabaye urugendo rutoroshe inyuma yo gutangura mu 2016 -imvune, hanyuma gufatirwa ibihano - ariko ivyo biri muri kahise. Ubu turiko turubaka kazoza." Omanyala yemeza ko ashobora kunyaruka kurusha akaba avuga ko yihaye kuzoja munsi y'ama sekunda 9,70 - ikintu kimaze gushikwako gusa na rurangiranwa Usain Bolt wo muri Jamaica, mugenziwe Yohan Blake n'umunya-Amerika Tyson Gay. Uwo yahoze ari umukinyi wa rugby hanyuma agahinduka umwirutsi yumva ko ashobora kwiruka cane kuruta aho mbere akegereza umuhigo w'isi wa Usain Bolt w'amasekunda 9,58. Yavuze atwenga ati : "Ntaho kugarukira hariho". Uwu mwaka wamuziye neza kuko yashitse mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma mu nkino za Olympic ziwe za mbere, hanyuma agaca umuhigo wo muri Kenya ku masekunda 10,00 wanabaye umwe mu myanya itanu yiwe myiza mu mezi indwi aheze. Avuga ati: "Nagumye ntera imbere mw'isiganwa ryose nagize kuko nagize amahiganwa menshi uyu mwaka." "Ivyo nivyo ngiye gukomeza mu mwaka kandi nzotangura hakiri kare nko mu kwezi kwa gatatu. Bisigura ko mu kwezi kwa gatandatu nzoba ngeze ku myanya myiza cane." Yizigiye kuba icitegererezo ku bandi Mu gihugu kizwi cane ku banonotsi biruka ku birere biri hagati na hagati na birebire, Omanyala ubu yifuza guha intege urunganwe rushasha rw'abanya-Kenya biruka ibirere bigufi (sprinters). Avuga ati: "Nsenga nsaba cane ko mu myaka itanu iri mbere twoba dufise ba Omanyala benshi, abana benshi bazi kwiruka, kuko ni je ndi uwa mbere nagwanye kugira nshike kw'isonga." "Ndazi ko hari abantu benshi bashobora kwiruka cane, mu mupira w'amaguru na  rugby, none dushoboye kuronka abirutsi 10, Kenya hari ico yoba ishitseko. "Ubu baremera ko bishoboka kuko abenshi mu babigerageje bacibwa intege n'abavyeyi babo canke abandi bantu bavuga ngo ''nta na hamwe ushobora gushika wiruka ibirere bigufi muri Kenya'. Ariko ubu abantu baremera ko bishoboka. "Ubu nshaka gutanguza umugwi w'abiruka ibirere bigufi hanyuma nshishikarize abakiri bato kwimenyereza turabe aho bazoshika." Umwe mu bemera ko Omanyala, Simbine n'abandi nk'abo nka Enoch Adegoke wo muri Nigeria, yashitse mu gice ca nyuma c'imetero 100 mu nkino za Olympic, bashobora kuba icitegererezo ku banya-Afrika ni uwahoze yitaba inkino za Olympic akagira n'umuhigo w'isi Justin Gatlin. Uwo munya-Amerika, yahejeje inyuma ya Omanyala ku wa gatandatu, avuga ati: "Abanya-Afrika barafise impano zo gushobora kwiruka. "Isi izi abanya-Afrika nk'abashoboye kwiruka ibirere birebire gusa ariko ubu hariho abazi gutera umuhunda  (javelot), abasimba, abiruka ibirere bigufi (sprinters), nibaza ko Afrika ubu yeretse isi ko idafise abashoboye kwiruka ibirere birebire gusa." "Ivyo ni ibintu bikomeye kuba Afrika ifise abo bose. Jewe kuva kera nemera ko Afrika ifise ico iha isi kuruta ivyo imaze gutanga gushika ubu." Abagabo 10 ba mbere banyaruka kw'isi gushika ubu

column2: Aba-Maasai TikTok yazaniye aba-fana ba Bollywood
column3: Mu mwambaro wabo uranga aba-Maasai kandi bakikijwe n'inka, abanya-Tanzania ba vuba mu kuba rurangiranwa kuri Tik Tok, abavukana Kili na Neema Paul, bariko bitegurira gufata video yabo ya vuba. Terefone ngendanwa igezweho yashinzwe ku nkingi imetero nkeya imbere y'inzu yabo muri Mindu Tulieni, ikigwati gito co mu ntara ya Pwani yo mu buseruko, Igisagara kiri hafi, Lugoba, kiri ku rugendo rw'isaha n'amaguru. Mu gihe ico kigwati ata muyagankuba gifise, Kili akigendera buri munsi kugira ashire umuriro muri terefone yiwe. Mu kwitegurira gufata iyo video , Kili, w'imyaka 26, ahagaze inyuma ya mushikiwe w'imyaka 23, Neema. Umuziki umaze gutangura kuvuga, Kili na mushikiwe baca bakurakuranwa mu kwigana  mu gi-Hindi bongera batamba  ku murindi w'izo ndirimbo zizwi cane muri  film/sinema za Bollywood [ingene bakubita iminwa bigahurirana neza neza n'amajambo y'iyo ndirimbo nk'uko womenga ijwi ni iryabo kandi humvikana iry'uwayiririmvye bwite; Lip sync). Mu mezi make aheze, izo video zabo zo gukubita iminwa zararabwe cane ku mbuga hwaniro mu Buhindi. Video yabo yamenyekanye cane, bigana  Raataan Lambiyan yo muri Shershaah , film y'uyu mwaka ya Bollywood, yarabwe incuro zirenga miriyoni imwe mu minsi mike gusa. Yakwiragijwe n'abakinyi bakuru muri iyo film Kiara Advani na Sidharth  Malhotra. Nyene kuririmba ubwa mbere iyo ndirimbo,  Jubin Nautiyal, yaratunguye abo bavukanyi igihe bagira ikiganiro c'ikibiriraho kuri imwe mu maradiyo yo mu Buhindi. Nautiyal yababwiye ati : "Bose barabazi  mu Buhindi. Muri rurangiranwa". Video bakoreye muri Mindu Tulieni, aho benshi badatunze terefone zigezweho, Kili na Neema ntibigeze bibaza ko zoshikiriye abantu baharurwa muri za miriyoni mu Buhindi no kw'isi nzima. Kili ati: "Tugitangura, vyari ibintu vyo kwiryohera gusa, ntitwigeze twibaza ko tuzomenyekana isi yose. "Maze gutangura kubona abantu bariko barayiraba n'ico bavuga mu Buhindi, naratangaye. Nararengewe." Icabatumye gukora izo video n'ugukunda film za Bollywood Kili yatanguye kuraba igihe yagenda mu mashure ku murwa mukuru , Dodoma. N'ubwo batari bazi urwo rurimi, we na mushikiwe bariyigishije kuririmba mu gi-Hindi. Kili avuga ati: "Kuva nkiri muto, nararaba ama film ya Bollywood mu ma cinema yo muri Tanzania nca ndakunda cane izo film n'indirimbo zirimwo. Iyo ukunda ikintu, biroroshe kuciga". "Binsaba iminsi mike yo kwiga amajambo y'indirimbo no kwimenyereza kuyisubiramwo. Ndarondera ico ayo majambo asigura mu congereza kugira menye uko ndayitamba neza." "N'imbere y'uko numva ico indirimbo ivuga, mba namaze kujana n'umuziki wayo." Kili yatanguye asubiramwo izo ndirimbo wenyene, mu nyuma azana mushikiwe nawe nyene asanzwe akunda film za  Bollywood. Neema avuga ati: "Igihe musazanje yansaba kugira video hamwe nawe, nabanje kwanka kuko nari mfise isoni zo kuja imbere ya camera." "Ariko mu nyuma ntangura kubimenyera. Ivy'abaye ni amayobera - ntitwigeze twibaza ko umunsi nk'uwo woshitse." Abo bavukana babiri, ubwa mbere bakuze baragira inka bakora no mu mirima, ubu umwanya bawumara batanga ibiganiro kuri television na radiyo zikomakomeye zo mu Buhindi. Ariko no mu gihugu cabo ca Tanzania, ubu baratanguye kumenyekana nka bamwe mu bazwi cane kuri Tik Tok. Konte izwi ya Kili kuri Tik Tok  ubu ifise miriyoni 1,8 y'abantu bamukurikira . Nta mwaka urakwira kuva atanguje iyo konte yiwe - amaze kumenya ivyerekeye Tik Tok abibwiwe n'abagenzi. Neema nawe aramaze kwuguruza konte yiwe kuri Instagram, ubu ikaba ifise abayikurikira bashika hafi 65.000. Ariko  mu gihe inkuru y'abo bavukana iriko irabica bigacika ku mbuga hwaniro hirya no hino kw'isi, mu muryango no mu babanyi ho basa n'uko ataco bazi kuba abana babo bariko baraba ba rurangiranwa. Kili avuga ati: "Abantu benshi ngaha ntibatunze terefone zigezweho kandi ntibazi ivyerekeye imbuga hwaniro. Na Neema nta vyinshi atahura. Biramuryohera gusa ariko ntazi ingaruka biriko biragira". "Nta muntu n'umwe yumva ivyari vyo igihe abanyamakuru batangura kuza mu kigwati iwacu bazanye n'ama-camera ya television. "Ubwa mbere umuryango wanje waguma wibaza igituma ndirimba  kandi ngatamba aho kuragira inka. "Ubu baratanguye gutahura ko ndiko ndakora ikintu ciza." Nta mafaranga barakura muri ivyo biyumviriye gukora, ariko vuba barashobora kuva mu buzima bwo mu kigwati bakaja gukina film/sinema. Ibinyamakuru vyo mu Buhindi bivuga ko baja bamaze gutangura kuronderwa cane  na Bollywood. Ni indoto zabaye ukuri kuri Kili  na Neema, bavuga ko kuva kera bamye bashaka gukora ivyo guteramisha abantu, ariko batigeze bibaza ko vyoshobotse. "Tuva mu kigwati gito hanze y'igisagara, nico gituma ntigeze nibaza ko indoto zanje zo kuba umukinyi w'ama-film no guhagarara imbere ya camera zobaye ukuri. Ivyo nabigumanye mu mutima wanje", ivyo bivugwa na Neema, we bitandukanye na musazawe,  atigeze ava muri Mundu Tulieni. "Amahirwe yo kuja mu Buhindi yoba ari igitangaza." Amakungu arorera, abo bavukana bavuga ko bafise ishaka ryo gutangura gukora izindi video zo guha ababakurikira. "Dushaka ko abantu baraba izi video bakaryoherwa, nico gituma twatanguye kuzikora." "Vyinshi biri mu nzira, abafana bacu rero ni bagume hafi." Priya Sippy n'umunyamakuru akorera uwubimusavye aba  London.

column2: Ronaldo ntazokurikiranwa ku caha co "gufata ku nguvu"
column3: Rurangiranwa mu mupira w'amaguru, Cristiano Ronaldo, ntazokurikiranwa nyuma yo kwagirizwa guhohotera bifatiye ku gitsina, nk'uko bitangazwa n'abashinjacaha muri Amerika. Kathryn Mayorga w'imyaka 34, yari yavuze ko uwo mukinyi wa Juventus yamusambanije ku nguvu mw'ihoteri i Las Vegas mu 2009. Bivugwa ko yashitse ku mwumvikano udaciye muri sentare n'uwo rurangiranwa wo muri Portugal mu 2010, ariko asaba ko urubanza rwosubira kwugururwa mu 2018. Ronaldo ahakana ivyo yagirizwa. Mu rwandiko rwasohowe kuwa mbere, abashinjacaha b'i Las Vegas bavuze ko ivyo uwo mugore avuga "bidashobora kwemezwa ata gukekeranya." Umwanditsi wa sentare yavuze ko uwo arega yavuze ko yahotewe mu 2009, ariko yanka kuvuga aho vyabereye canke uwamuhohoteye uwo ari we. Ngo ku bw'izo mvo rero igipolisi nticashoboye "gukora itohoza iryo ari ryo ryose ryogira ishingiro." Mu kwezi kw'umunani 2018, igipolisi c'i Las Vegas cakoze irindi tohoza bisabwe n'uwo avuga ko yahohotewe. Igitangazamakuru co mu Budage, Der Spiegel, nico catangaje ubwa mbere iyo nkuru mu mwaka uheze. Cavuze ko mu 2010 uwo mugore yashitse ku mwumvikano bidaciye muri sentare na Ronaldo, aho yahawe amahera $375,000, yemera ko atazokwigera avuga ivyo vyagiriji ku mugaragaro. Uwunganira Madamu Mayorga mu vy'amategeko yavuze ko yahawe ingoga zo kuvyutsa uru rubanda n'isekeza rya #MeToo, rirwanya ihohoterwa ry'abagore. Ronaldo ntiyahakanye ko yahuye n'uwo mugore i Las Vegas mu 2009, ariko avuga ko ivyabaye hagati yabo vyari ku gushaka kwa bose. Ico gihe Ronaldo yari agikinira Manchester United, agomba aje muri Real Madrid, aho yamaze imyaka icenda yakurikiye.

column2: Ethiopia: Uko intambara yo muri Tigray yahindutse indwano yo hagati mu gihugu
column3: Intambara yo mu ntara ya Tigray yo mu buraruko bwa Ethiopia  ubu yahavuye iba indwano yo hagati mu gihugu iteye impungenge zo  kumanyagura ico gihugu no guhungabanya akarere kose. Abagararije ubutegetsi batumbereje ibitero berekeza mu bumanuko bagana umurwa mukuru mpuzantara, Addis Ababa, bituma umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy Ahmed, yaronse agashimwe k'amahoro kitiriwe Nobel akaba yanahoze ari umusikirikare w'ipete rya lieutenant colonel - aja ku rugamba kuyobora ingabo z'igihugu. Aho indwano ikomereye gusumba vyaciye bituma abanyamahanga baturuka mu bihugu vya Buraya n'abakozi badakenewe cane ba ONU bava muri ico gihugu, bavuga ko umutekano wunyutse. Inyuma y'indwano yo mu gihugu mu myaka ya 1970 na 1980, Ethiopia yaciye iba kimwe mu bihugu vy'ubutunzi bwihuta cane kuduga muri Afrika, yongera iba inkingi  y'amaragamo mu karere. None ubu intureka ihitana abantu yakwiye igihugu iturutse mu karere k'abagarariji bo muri Tigray aho intambara yatanguriye, ikwira intara ya Amhara bihana urubibe mu buraruko bushira uburengero na Afar mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko. Intsinzi za vuba z'ingabo z'igihugu ku rugamba nta kinini zagize kugira zivaneho ubwoba  bw'indwano iguma ikomera aho imaze kugwamwo abantu ibihumbi , abaharurwa muri za miriyoni nabo bagateshwa izabo. Umugambwe Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF)  wagararije ubutegetsi uvuga ko  ibitero vyawo vyo mu bumanuko bigamije kugondoza reta kugira ireke ukwugarana intara ya Tigray kwatumye ugutumatumanako no gushikira imfashanyo y'abari mu kaga bigorana cane. Ariko, ubutegetsi bwa Abiy bwagirije  abagararije gukwiragiza bakoresheje ibigwanisho ko hakenewe ko intwaro ihinduka, bigarukana ubwoba ko TPLF  ishaka kugaruka ku butegetsi. TPLF yamaze imyaka 27  yiganziye urubuga rwa poritike muri Ethiopia inyuma yo gushoza intanbara y'ubugarariji nk'iyo y'ubu mu 1991  kuri reta ya gi-komunista. Ubutegetsi bwabo bwashikanye igihugu kw'iyubakwa ry'ibikorwa remezo vyinshi vyadugije cane ubutunzi bwa Ethiopia, ariko buca burangwa n'agacinyizo ka poritike n'imibano. Ico ca nyuma nico cateye imyiyerekano yo kwanka reta yatumye Abiy ashika ku butegetsi muri Ndamukiza (ukwezi kwa 4) mu 2018 aho yaca atanguza impinduka z'imibano, poritike n'umutekano. Mu kurwanya iyo reta, TPLF yaciye yunga ubucuti bwo gukomeza ubushobozi bwayo bwo kugwana no kwongereza igihagararo cayo inyuma yo gushigikirwa n'imigambwe ishingiye ku bwoko itavuga rumwe n'umushikiranganji wa mbere. Iyo ntambara ubwa mbere yari hagati ingabo za TPLF n'ingabo z'igihugu, zishigikiwe n'utugwi tw'abigenza nk'abagwanyi  two muri Amhara  hamwe n'ingabo za Eritrea. Indongozi za TPLF  zaromowe mu minsi mike, ariko ubugarariji bwariko burarandagata muri Tigray hagati, bwunyura ibintu vyari bisanzwe bimeze nabi ku buryo abantu babayeyo. Abantu barenga 90% y'ababa muri iyo ntara -bashika miriyoni 5,2 - bakeneye imfashanyo yihuta, nk'uko ONU ibigereranya. Abaharurwa mu bihumbi barahungiye mu gihugu kibanyi ca Sudan -naco gisanzwe kiri mu bibazo  bijanye  n'itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi. Inyeshamba zahuje umwanya wo gufata umurwa mukuru w'intara Mekelle mu kwezi kwa gatandatu n'igihe Ethiopia yari irindiriye ibiva mu matora kugira bahungabanye ukwemerwa kwa Abiy Ahmed. Inyeshamba zimaze  gushikana intambara hakurya y'imbibe za Tigray, imigwi yitwara nk'ingabo yo mu ntara zishingiye ku moko zirimwo Somali na Oromia yaciye yinjiramwo. Akamo umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy yagumye atera k'uko abantu bafata ibigwanisho kugira batangire inyeshamba katumye  ikoreshwa ry'ibigwanisho rirushirizaho guhabwa ikibanza. Mw'itangazo ryahavuye rifutwa kuri Facebook ku wa 4 Munyonyonyo (ukwezi kwa 11) kubera  ryashobora kugumura, Abiy yavuze ati: "Ni inshingano z'umwe umwe muri twebwe gupfira Ethiopia. Nico gituma abantu bategerezwa kubanza gushira ivyabo ku ruhande hanyuma bitunganye mu buryo bwemewe hanyuma baje ahabona n'ikigwanisho cose n'ubushobozi bashobora kuronka kugira bazibire kandi bahambe abaterabwoba ba TPLF, biyemeje gusambura." Intumbero y'igihugu ya Abiy yerekanye intege nke zikiri mu ntwaro y'intara nyinshi zishingiye ku moko  zigahurira kuri reta imwe , nk'uko biri mw'ibwirizwa nshingiro ryo mu 1994. N'ubwo iryo bwirizwa nshingiro ryarondera kwongera imigwi y'amoko uburenganzira bwo gutunganya ivy'intara zayo, imwe imwe yabandanije gahunda zo kurondera kuronka ubwigenge bwuzuye kuva Abiy ashitse ku butegetsi. Mu kwezi kw'umunani, TPLF yagiraniye urunani n'umuhari w'abitwaje ibigwanisho ba Oromo (Oromo Liberation Army, OLA) wo mu bwoko nyamwinshi muri Ethiopia ariko bwagumye bukumirwa n'intwaro zari zagiye zirakurikirana. Abiy niwe yabaye uwa mbere wo mu bwoko bw'aba Oromo yagiye mu kibanza c'umushikiranganji wa mbere. Ariko reta imaze gufata igapfunga abanyeporitike bakomeye b'aba-Oromo, OLA yaciye ikora ikomeza kutavuga rumwe n'umushikiranganji wa mbere. .  Urunani rwa OLA na TPLF rwatumye abagwanya reta bafata ibisagara bikomakomeye muri Amhara -harimwo Kemise, Dessie na Kombolcha - uko baguma basugereza umurwa mukuru. Ugusugereza umurwa mukuru kwaranakomejwe no gushigikirwa n'iyindi migwi ya poritike n'iyitwaje ibigwanisho icenda, na cane cane ishingiye mu mahanga yakangisha gukura umushikiranganji wa mbere. Reta ya Ethiopia kuva ico gihe imaze gutangaza ko yaguruje bimwe mu bisagara vyari vyafashwe n'abayirwanya. Abizeye ibiganiro barazerutse Itariki indwi za Munyonyo (ukwezi kwa 11) , intumwa y'ishirahamwe rya Africa (AU), uwahoze ari umukuru wa Nigeria Olusegun Obasanjo, yari yatanze  icizere  ko impande zirwana zari zugurukiye ibiganiro. Ariko inyeshamba n'umushikiranganji wa mbere  Abiy bakomeje guterana ibidashika. Umukuru wa TPLF Debretsion Gebremichael haheze iminsi ibiri abonanye n'intumwa y'ishirahamwe rya Afrika yavuze ati: "Ingabo z'akagwi k'abatwaza igitugu zahumbahumbwe. Ubu rero zirindiriye guhambwa nk'abandi bose batwaza umukazo, kandi ivyo bizoba vuba." Mu kwishura, umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy nawe yavuze ati izo nyeshamba "zizokwicwa rubi  vuba". Muri uwo mwanya nyene,  kwotswa igitutu n'akarere vyaragaganutse, akamo k'amakungu k'ibiganiro nako kabonwa nko kwivanga mu biraba Ethiopia. Ukuba ishirahamwe rya Afrika ataho ryegamiye -rifise icicaro caryo muri Ethiopia -  nakwo hari abagufiseko  amakenga. Ivyo vyabaye na cane cane inyuma y'inyandiko yaryo kuri Twitter mu kwezi kw'umunani, kuva ico gihe ryaciye rivanwako, ryanegura akamo ka Amerika ko gusaba ko haba ibiganiro. Imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza Amerika n'ibindi bihugu vy'i Buraya n'ibinyamakuru vyo mu mahanga yagumye yiyongera i Addis Ababa no mu banya-Ethiopia baba hanze.

column2: Umunyamakuru akaba n'umwanditsi kuri Afrika akomeye, Pierre Pean, yapfuye
column3: Pierre Pean, umuhinga kuri Afrika akaba yaranditse n'ibitabo vyinshi yaryamiye ukuboko kw'abagabo ejo kuwa kane afise imyaka 81. Nk'uko bivugwa n'igitangazamakuru co mu Bufaransa, France 24, umunyamakuru Pierre Pean, umukozi w'itohoza abushitse, yibanze cane kuri Afrika, n'ibitangazamakuru. Yibanze kandi ku banyepolitike - cane cane kahise katabonwa kumwe k'uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu Francois Mitterrand mu gihe aba Nazi bari bacigaruriye Ubufaransa. Yaryamiye ukuboko kw'abagabo ejo tariki 25/07/2019 nk'uko umuryango wiwe wabitangarije ibiro ntaramakuru, AFP. Umuhungu wiwe w'umwanditsi Jean Gregor, yabwiye AFP ko Pierre Pean yahitanywe n'uburwayi ku bitaro vya Argenteuil mu karere ka Val-d'Oise. Ikinyamakuru co kuri internet, France Bleu, canditse ko Pierre Pean atakunda ko bamwita umunyamakuru w'itohoza. Mu matohoza yiwe yibanda ku kwerekana ukuntu ivyo atohoza canke abo atohozako bagoranye. Yavuze ko yaba ashaka gutohoza yidegemvya, ku bintu yihitiyemwo kandi ku gushaka kwiwe, ntabwirizwe canke ngo ajane narwo afatiye ku bivugwa mu bitangazamakuru canke imanza zo mu ma sentare. Yarandanitse ku Rwanda igitabo yise "Noir Fureur Blanc Menteur: Rwanda 1990-1994", igitabo kitashimwe n'ubutegetsi buriho mu Rwanda. Muri ico gitabo casohotse mu 2005, Pierre Pean ashira akabazo ku nkuru ya jenoside yo mu Rwanda ku buryo ivugwa n'ubutegetsi. Ku bw'ico gitabo, uwo mwanditsi yararezwe muri sentare n'ishirahamwe SOS Racisme, rimwagiriza "kugira uruhara mu gukwega urwanko rufatiye ku moko", kuko yanditse ko Abatutsi "bafise umuco w'ikinyoma no guhishahisha." Urwo rubanza yararutsinze.

column2: Papa Francis: Gatolika yakoze amakosa mu "gucinyiza imico y'abandi"
column3: Umwungere wa Elkeziya Gatolika, Papa Francis, yavuze ko iryo shengero ryakoze amakosa mu gushimikira ku muco umwe gusa, rimwe na rimwe hakanakoreshwa inguvu mu gushika ku mugambi waryo Papa yavuze yuko ivyo vyahombeje Ishengero ubutunzi butandukanye bwo mu mico n'imigenzo myinshi. Yavuze yuko inyigisho z'ishengero zerekanye yuko hakwiye kwubahirizwa "inkomoko y'umuco n'akaranga vya buri muntu." Ivyo Papa Francis yabivugiye mu mubonano rusangi uba buri wa gatati i Vaticano. Abivuze mu gihe hari umwidogo ku mugabane wa Amerika y'ubumanuko ku vyagizwe igihe Espagne yigarurira ico gice c'isi ikanashira mu bukoroni ba kavukire baho. Kuwa kabiri umukuru w'igisagara ca Mexico mu gihugu ca Mexique yavuze yuko igishusho c'umugore kavukire kizosubirira ica Christopher Columbus (afatwa nk'uwatoye aho umugabane wa Amerika uri) muri kimwe mu bice bikomeye vy'uwo muji.

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w’amaguru kuri uyu wa 14.07.2019: Coutinho, Hudson-Odoi, Pogba, Maguire, Neymar, Sane
column3: Umukinyi wo hagati wa Barcelona, Philippe Coutinho, yanse kwinjira muri Manchester United, aho ni mu gihe bivugwa ko bishoboka ko asubira muri Liverpool, ariko hakaba hari amahirwe menshi y'uko uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 27 ashobora  kugurwa na Paris St-Germain. (Express) Barcelona yijeje umufasha wa Coutinho ko ata mugambi ifise yo kugurisha uyo mukinyi, ariko akavuga ko umukiriya wiwe yoba ariko ashaka kugurishwa ku yindi mirwi ya Espanye. (Sky Sports) Bayern Munich ntirota iheba kurondera umusatirizi wa Chelsea, Callum Hudson-Odoi w'imyaka 18, bikaba vyitezwe ko itanga ayandi mahera agera ku miliyoni 45 z'amapawundi muri iyi ndwi. (Mail) Manchester United ntizoshobora kugurisha muri Real Madrid umukinyi wayo wo hagati, umufaransa Paul Pogba w'imyaka 26, mu gihe uyo murwi wa Espanye womurondera igihe cagenewe kugura abakinyi kirangiye ku wa 8 z'ukwezi kw'umunani. (Mirror) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Leicester, umwongereza Harry Maguire w'imyaka 26 - asanzwe ariko aronderwa na Manchester United ku giciro c'imiliyoni 75 z'amapawundi  - yabwiye uwo murwi ko yipfuza kugenda. (Mail) Maguire yagiriza Leicester ko iriko isaba amafaranga arenze urugero, ni mu gihe imiliyoni 70 z'ama pawundi zimaze kumutangwako na Manchester United hamwe na Manchester City ariko iramwimana. (Sun) Umusatirizi w'umunyabrezili Neymar w'imyaka  27, abandanya asaba ko yokwisubirira muri Barcelona, akavuga ko ico aguma yibuka gusumba ibindi vyose ari intsinzi ya Barca y'ibitsindo 6 kuri 1 ca  Paris St-Germain mu 2017. (Mail) Uyo mukinyi wa PSG, uwa mbere yaguzwe amahera menshi kw'isi, yagiye kwunyura ibintu mu gukwiragiza ireresi irimwo isanamu yiwe yambaye impuzi ya Barcelona, yakurikijeko ubutumwa bwo mw'isezerano rya kera muri Bibiliya. (Goal.com) Umukinyi wa Tottenham akina hagati, Christian Eriksen w'imyaka 27 asanzwe kandi akinira  Danemark, ashobora kubandanya akinira uyo murwi kubera habuze uwundi murwi ufise uburyo bukwiye kugira ngo ushobore kumugura. (Guardian) Liverpool yinjiye mu gitigiri c'imirwi iriko irondera umusatirizi wa CSKA Moscow, Fedor Chalov  ku miliyoni 20 z'amapawundi. Arsenal, Manchester City, Tottenham, Chelsea na Manchester United nazo nyene zikaba zishinze ijisho uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 21. (Mirror) Tottenham ibandanya irondera umukinyi wo hagati  wa Real Betis Giovani lo Celso w'imyaka 23 asanzwe kandi akinira n'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Argentina.  Ku ruhande rwayo, Betis ishinze ijisho ku mukinyi wo hagati w'umufaransa, Nabil Fekir afise imyaka 25, akaba asanzwe akinira Lyon. (Football.London) Arsenal yatanze ayandi mafaranga angana n'imiliyoni 25 z'amapawundi ku mukinyi w'inyuma wa Celtic, Kieran Tierney w'imyaka 22, inyuma y'aho uyu murwi wo muri Ecosse wankiye igiciro c'imiliyoni 15 z'amapawundi zari zatanzwe na Arsenal mu kwa gatandatu. (Mail) Daniel Sturridge yahawe akaryo ko kunagura umwuga wiwe mu murwi Bologna wo mu Butaliyano, inyuma y'aho uyo musatirizi w'umwongereza w'imyaka 29 aviriye muri Liverpool. (Express) Arsenal iriteguye guhangana na Tottenham hamwe na Juventus mu kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa AS Roma, Nicolo Zaniolo w'imyaka 20. (Calciomercato) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Manchester City, Leroy Sane, ntariko arwanirwa na Bayern Munich yonyene - uyo mudagi w'imyaka 23 ariko arwanirwa n'amahinguriro atatu ahingura ibirato vy'abakinyi. (Sun) Liverpool ivuga ko ata na kimwe iravugana na Real Madrid ku musatirizi w'umunyasenegali, Sadio Mane w'imyaka 27, n'aho umukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru rya Senegali, Saer Seck, avuga ko uyo murwi wo mu gihugu ca Espanye woba umaze kumutangako igiciro. (Liverpool Echo) Ibiganiro bigeze kure hagati ya Atletico Madrid na Napoli  kugira ngo igure umukinyi w'inyuma akomoka muri Albania, Elseid Hysaj w'imyaka 25, asanzwe kandi ariko aronderwa na Manchester United. (Football Italia) Dinamo Zagreb ivuga ko ishobora kugurisha umukinyi wo hagati, Dani Olmo w'imyaka 21 akomoka muri Espanye, abandanya aronderwa na Manchester United.  (Manchester Evening News) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Everton, umunyasenegali Idrissa Gueye w'imyaka 29, avuga ko amaze kwumva ibihuha bivuga ko ashobora kwimukira muri Paris St-Germain, ariko ko ikimuraje ishinga ubu ari ihiganwa ry'igikombe rihuza imirwi ya Afrika. (Sport Witness)

column2: Burundi: Abasenyeri gatolika bavuga ko utunenge mu matora bakibaza niba ivyayavuyemwo vyizigirwa
column3: Inama nkuru y'Abepiskopi b'I Burundi (CECAB) ivuga ko amatora aheruka yo ku wa 20 z'uku kwa gatanu yaranzwe n'utungenge twinshi twatumye ivyayavuyemwo bibaza niba ari ivyo kwizigira. Mw'itangazo baraye basohoye kuri uyu wa 26/5, abepiskopi 'i Burundi bamenyesha ko barungitse indorerezi 2,716 mu makomine yose, zigashobora kuja ku tuzu tw'amatora batoye. Evariste Ndayishimiye niwe yatangajwe ku vy'agateganyo n'umurwi CENI ujejwe amatora ko yatsinze ayo matora n'amajwi 68%, Agathon Rwasa akaza ubwa kabiri n'amajwi 24%. Umugambwe CNL wa Agathon Rwasa be nawe ubwiwe, ntibemera ivyayavuyemwo. Uwutemera ivyatangajwe na CENI afise umunsi ntarengwa w'uyu munsi ku wa gatatu ngo yiture sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro. Mw'iryo tangazo, abasenyeri bavuga ko muri rusangi amatora yabaye mw'ituze, ariko y'uko hari utunenge twinshi dushingiye kw'ihonyangwa ry'ubwigenge, ukudafata kumwe abitoza n'abatora. Utunenge abo basenyeri bashira ahabona twashoboye kubonwa n'izo ndorerezi zabo aho zashoboye gushika ni utu: "Igitsure catewe bamwe mu baserukiye abitoza ngo batere igikumu ku mpapuro z'ivyegeranyo vy'ivyavuye mu matora imbere y'uko baharura"; "Amasandugu amwe amwe yashizwemo amakarata y'amajwi arenze (bourrage des urnes)"; "Abatoreye abantu bapfuye be n'impunzi"; "Abantu wasanga bafise amakete yo gutorera abandi menshi, ivyo navyo bitemewe". "Mu tuzu tw'amatora tumwe tumwe hari abantu batoye incuro zirenga imwe". "Hari abaserukiye abitoza be n'indorerezi birukanywe mu guharura amajwi". "Hari bamwe mu batora bakorewe iterabwoba baterwa n'igitsure na bamwe mu bategetsi banabaherekeza no mu bwiherero". "Abantu batemewe n'amategeko biyadukiza bakinjira mu bibanza vyo guharuriramwo amajwi". "Gutora mw'ibanga bitubahirijwe". "Bamwe mu bahagarikizi baratswe impapuro zibaha uburenganzira bwo guhagararira amatora banakwa n'amaterefone yabo". Abo basenyeri gatorika mu Burundi babona ko utwo tunenge dutuma bibaza niba ivyari vyitezwe gutangazwa vyizigirwa. Babona kandi ko hari abariko barahohotera canke bashaka guturubika ababanyi babo inyuma y'aya matora, babahora ko badasangiye ivyiyumviro, bagasaba abategetsi guhana abo bantu. Bati: "Mu gihe amategeko yemera ko haba abahiganwa benshi, buri munyagihugu yari afise uburenganzira bwo kwerekana uwo yipfuza gushigikira". Abo basenyeri basaba ko uwumva ko yarenganijwe yokwirinda gukoresha imigumuko, agaca mu nziza y'ubutungane kugira ngo atunganirizwe. Mu matora atatu yabaye kuwa gatatu uheze, ihiganwa ryari rikomeye ryari hagati y'umugambwe CNDD-FDD uri ku butegetsi hamwe na CNL utavuga rumwe nawo. Imigambwe imwe n'abandi bitoje ku giti cabo ku mwanya w'umukuru w'igihugu baremeye ivyavuye mu matora n'ubwo banenze utunenge tumwe tumwe twibonekeje. Hagati aho, umugambwe CNL uvuga ko amatora yabayemwo ubusuma, ukavuga ko washoboye kwegeranya ivyegeranyo vy'amatora vyerekana ko ari wo wayatsinze. Domitien Ndayizeye witoza ashizwe imbere n'urunani Kira Burundi, yabwiye BBC utunenge yabonye twabaye mu matora, ariko avuga ko "igihe uwatowe azoba amaze kwemezwa na CENI ubwa nyuma nta kizomubuza gutwara Uburundi". Umugwi CENI ujejwe gutegura amatora wowo wemeza ko amatora yagenze neza. Sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro utegerezwa kumenyesha ibiharuro ntabanduka vyayavuyemwo ku wa 04 z'ukwa gatandatu.
